messages.title: Keeping his promises
messages.content: In 2015 I made a promise; I promised to stand by our community and never vote for something that I knew would hurt local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will continue to oppose Brexit under any circumstances.
Keep fighting for genuinely affordable homes.
Will continue to champion free health and care services for all.
Will keep opposing Tory cuts to education.
Will continue to stay strong on policing and defence.

issues.brexitEurope: Will continue to oppose Brexit under any circumstances.
issues.education: Will keep opposing Tory cuts to education.
issues.health: Will continue to champion free health and care services for all.

housing.content: Keep fighting for genuinely affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud to say that I kept my promise. I will always put local people first.

images.caption: Neil Coyle on the doorstep talking to constituents.
Neil Coyle sitting with a constituent.

leaflet.additionalNotes: A record of broken promises: Lib Dems got into bed with the Tories - and will do it again, Lib Dems break their promises - they cannot be trusted, Lib Dems backed the Tories' hated Bedroom Tax.
